channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server D50DNP Family products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server D50DNP Family products

item.title: CVE-2024-22095|2024-05-16T20:47:00.564Z -- n/a -- UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server D50DNP Family products
item.description: Improper input validation in PlatformVariableInitDxe driver in UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server D50DNP Family products may allow a privileged user to enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-23487|2024-05-16T20:46:58.874Z -- n/a -- UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server D50DNP Family products
item.description: Improper input validation in UserAuthenticationSmm driver in UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server D50DNP Family products may allow a privileged user to enable escalation of privilege via local access.
